programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's gruelling challenge nears its climax. The chefs take turns leading the kitchen for dinner service. Find out who will make the final and who will fall at the final hurdle.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay's extreme cookery challenge reaches its climax as the final two hopefuls battle it out for a coveted head chef's job. Who will Gordon choose as this year's winner?

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay is bringing back former black jacket chefs to compete in an all-star season for the biggest prize in Hell's Kitchen history.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: 16 all-star chefs compete against each other in a bar menu challenge and Chef Ramsay surprises everyone with a shocking elimination.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: With 15 chefs remaining, the Red and Blue teams must race against each other to build a gourmet seafood tower and later go head to head in a heated dinner service with table side appetisers.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: In the season finale, Ian tries to bring it all together.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client break all the rules and build the ultimate boat-inspired, open-aired cruiser. (Part 1)

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian and his most ambitious client continue the ultimate open-aired cruiser build and debut it a top West Coast car show. (Part 2)

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian gets a call from a top Hollywood picture car coordinator and works his magic to get a vintage race car back in action.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: Ian is commissioned to help build a wild, massive mobile floating party island for a prestigious festival in the Nevada desert (Burning Man).

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: A new client comes into the picture with a vintage desire; a hand-built motorcycle in the vein of early Harley Davidson’s, but with a Full Custom twist. And later, Ian pushes the envelope with a cool electric bike build for himself.

programme.title: Andromeda: The Illusion of Majesty
programme.desc: A wrong turn after exiting a slipstream sends the Andromeda into the Prolon system. They rescue an escape pod from certain disaster, but the pride wants it back.

programme.title: Andromeda: Twilight of the Idols
programme.desc: The crew seeks for a lost colony of Nietzscheans and discovers another crew that has been secretly helping them.

programme.title: Andromeda: Day of Judgement, Day of Wrath
programme.desc: The crew installs a new AI in a new Commonwealth battleship, and naturally things don't go as they should.

programme.title: Andromeda: Shadows Cast by a Final Salute
programme.desc: Tyr convinces the Nietzscheans that he is the reincarnation of Drago Museveni.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: A message from a collector sends Dylan on a quest to rescue a hostage and find the remains of the Commonwealth fleet.

programme.title: Andromeda: Pieces of Eight
programme.desc: Citizen Eight tries to remove Dylan from command of the Andromeda.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes with the psychics on the show.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Blood Money
programme.desc: Psychics Kelvin Cruickshank (NZ) and Deb Webber (Aus) investigate the unsolved murder of Lower Hutt pensioner 91 year old George Engelbrecht. In 1979, a burglar broke into George's home and beat the old man to death in his bed.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Sensing Murder Insights - Special
programme.desc: Police detectives from around New Zealand reveal exciting new developments sparked by the Sensing Murder psychics in Series 1.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Night Caller: Eric Edgar Cooke
programme.desc: In 1959, the carefree culture of Perth changed forever when a plague of crime hit the city. By early 1963, the crime wave had escalated to serial murder.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Disappearance of Donald Mackay
programme.desc: A small group of local criminals with mafia connections were making vast fortunes in the famous NSW Riverina irrigation district from marijuana plantations.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: No More Grannies / The Granny Killer
programme.desc: We delve into the twisted mind of one of Australia's most prolific serial murderers. John Wayne Glover - The Granny Killer, was truly an evil man.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Kimberley Killer
programme.desc: Seven years after the disappearance of baby Azaria Chamberlain at Ayers rock, long before the murder of Peter Falconio on a remote stretch of highway in the Australian outback and two years before Ivan Milat begins his reign of backpacker murders.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Betwixt and Between
programme.desc: Rose discovers her life is a lie and Stevie pays a terrible price.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Truth or Dare
programme.desc: Predators are everywhere on Drovers Run as Dave’s brother drops from the sky.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The King And I
programme.desc: Jodi’s world is turned upside down when she receives a birthday gift from the late Jack McLeod.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Intentions
programme.desc: Dave is blackmailed by a student and has to fight to save his career.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Stranger than Fiction
programme.desc: Moira predicts a wave of terrible trouble – and Moira is never wrong.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: 12 and a Half Hours Behind
programme.desc: Tess returns to Drovers to discover she is ten weeks pregnant, but an even bigger shock is in store…

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO Ellis Jacob goes undercover doling out snacks and tickets while assessing how to enhance the moviegoer experience within Canada’s largest motion picture exhibitor across the board.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The Victorian Order of Nurses takes the pressure off hospitals by providing care for people in their own homes. Hundreds of rival companies compete for cash and customers.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Brian Scudamore, 1-800-GOT-JUNK? founder and CEO, goes undercover as a driver and junk collector, hauling loads of unwanted clutter in the world’s largest junk removal franchise, and comes out collecting something much more valuable.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: The CEO of Canadian restaurant chain East Side Mario’s finds out what it’s really like for the Average Joe when he steps away from financial management to spend a week working undercover in his own kitchens

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Congress Theater
programme.desc: TAPS heads to Chicago Illinois to investigate a Chicago landmark for nearly a century, the Congress Theater.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Betsy Ross House
programme.desc: A family living in a Revolutionary War era house in Pennsylvania fears for their child and urgently calls on the TAPS team for help.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: 1st Edition Apparition
programme.desc: TAPS is revisiting Edith Wharton's home, The Mount, in Lenox, Massachusetts. It's believed Edith andher husband could be behind increased activity since the team's last investigation in 2008.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: The Plot Thickens
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, owners of a haunted theatre in Woonsocket, Rhode Island buy the building next door and activity spikes! TAPS investigates both buildings to see if spirits are traveling between the two locations.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Club Dead

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Coaching Day
programme.desc: Dog takes the day off to try his hand at coaching, and assigns Tim and Leland to track down a dangerous fugitive on their own. Can the boys prove they can handle it?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Women of Waikiki
programme.desc: The boys get distracted by the bikini-clad lovelies on Waikiki when they hunt for Lucy, a homeless, alcoholic fugitive. Beth is amused by the boys, but this is serious business: Tim will have to pay the bond if Lucy isn't caught.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: To Capture One's Own
programme.desc: Dog faces a tough personal and professional situation when he must hunt down his friend, Ili, who has helped him on many busts. But now Ili's on the other side of the law, and now Dog must bring her in.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Bags and Boxers
programme.desc: Dog is out to make two grabs on two islands in one day. Part of the team is goes to Kona to nab a woman who skipped her court date. Meanwhile, Dog and the others hunt Patrick, a fugitive who's fighting in an Extreme Boxing event on the Big Island.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Dog has only a few days to catch a woman nicknamed Cats or forfeit Beth's $10,000 bond. But it won't be easy - Cats is eight months pregnant, so Dog will have to lure her in rather than risk a violent grab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Destiny Love
programme.desc: Dog is in for a big surprise after he catches a fugitive named Jonaven in a sting operation.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: If You Knew Nunu
programme.desc: Dog and the team really have their hands full when they go after a tough guy named Nunu, who leads them on a chase through apartment complexes and a shopping mall before he's finally captured.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Double Trouble
programme.desc: Dog's feeling lucky, so he's going to try to capture two women in one day. The first, Moani, has "crazy" tattooed on her neck and is facing drug charges. The second fugitive, Jade, who turns out to be a tough catch, despite help from Jade's sister.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Big Island, Small Town
programme.desc: Dog has problems when he goes to a small town on the Big Island of Hawaii to track down a fugitive. In a small town, everyone knows everyone else's business, making it impossible for Dog to hunt in secret.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Jonah is Missing
programme.desc: Dog and the team search for Jonah, a violent and desperate criminal facing?20 years in jail. The trail goes stale when Dog runs into evasive family members and an angry girlfriend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: From Duck 'til Dawn
programme.desc: When the duck guys have to pull an all-nighter to finish some work, Willie decides he wants to join them. But when a dying smoke detector distracts them from their work, Jase and Willie head off to disarm it.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Burger Commander
programme.desc: After visiting a popular burger restaurant, Willie and Jase get into a debate over which of them cooks the best burger, prompting them to challenge one another to a cooking contest.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: G.I. Si
programme.desc: When Willie and Jase argue over an old G.I. Joe toy, it leads them into a debate over who would make a better soldier. To settle the score, Willie and Jase head out to the woods with their friends and children for a paintball match.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Jase and the Argonauts
programme.desc: When Willie gets a soft serve machine for himself, he tells the guys they can't use it until they're done working. But when Jase thinks this is unfair, he takes matters into his own hands and finds a better object to use as motivation.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Fowl Playhouse
programme.desc: When Jase finds out Jep is planning to buy his kids a fancy playhouse from a catalogue, he and the guys decide to build one for Jep themselves. But the playhouse ends up looking more like a military-style duck blind.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Big LeCOWski
programme.desc: When Sadie spends the day at Duck Commander for a school project, the guys try to show her the ins-and-outs of how a successful company works. But when Willie questions Jase's ingenuity in creating new products they get into a debate.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: The Robertson family pulls together a family reunion to give Mia a big send-off before her surgery.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Governor's Travels
programme.desc: When the Governor of Louisiana announces that he will be coming to Duck Commander to present Willie with a commerce award, John Luke volunteers to give the introduction speech.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack and Gown
programme.desc: With Reed's graduation day approaching, Jase decides to take Reed frog hunting the night before, like he did on the day of his own graduation. Willie and Si join in, and Jase tries to keep them from imparting their "college advice" on Reed.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Hands on a Woodchipper
programme.desc: When Willie agrees to sponsor Mountain Man's radio contest, a "Hands on a Hardbody" competition, he somehow finds himself competing against Si for Mountain Man's last minute prize: a woodchipper.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: SAR rookie Sybilla Helms is put to the test with a real mission.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In southeastern British Columbia, Nelson Search and Rescue is rescuing an overly curious canine who’s tumbled off a cliff.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Kent-Harrison Search and Rescue deal with darkness and death on a late night callout.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Parks Canada Search and Rescue deal with injured hikers and bad news bears.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In Southeastern British Columbia, Columbia Valley Search and Rescue scour the rugged backcountry for a missing field researcher.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: On Vancouver Island’s challenging 75 kilometre West Coast hiking Trail, heavy fog hinders Parks Canada rescue efforts.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: A late night mission turns strange for Penticton and Nelson Search and Rescue when the surviving witness is cuffed on an outstanding arrest warrant.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: In British Columbia’s Fraser Valley, Kent Harrison Search and Rescue respond to a late night SOS for missing hikers.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Military and civilian Search and Rescue team up for a major SAR exercise.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Nelson SAR is en-route to rescue a snowmobiler who’s crashed and tumbled 35 metres down a mine shaft.

programme.title: Callout Search And Rescue
programme.desc: Penticton SAR helicopter long lines a driver off the roof of his car in the middle of an icy river.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Once a Cheater Always a Cheater
programme.desc: Alyssia says Devonte is a serial cheater, but wants to save their relationship. He says she's insecure and stalks his social media. They share a child, but Devonte doesn't want to commit if she won't change. Can Judge Toler help them?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Down in the DM
programme.desc: Clifford feels that Asia is always searching for things that aren’t there. Asia says she is done with Clifford and the way he uses social media to flirt and cheat with women. Can Judge Lynn Toler help put a stop to the arguing?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Quanasia can no longer deal with Chandler's lying just so he can have his affairs. Chandler says she lost her drive after having his kids. Can Judge Toler wake her up from Chandler's hypnotizing charm or is this couple a lost cause?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Brexit
programme.desc: Over 17 years of marriage Leon has had countless affairs with other women and Siobhan has had it. She claims all he wants is for her to keep his house clean and pick up after him. Leon argues that the problems stem from Siobhan’s bad drinking habits.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Done Done
programme.desc: Nichele says Stewart would pay the neighbors to spy on her. She says he was never supportive when it came to parenting. Stewart says Nichele has always denied cheating on him but he believes in his heart she did.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Fantasy Fail
programme.desc: Victoria is sick of Casey neglecting his responsibilities. Casey feels like a slave for taking care of the kids while she flies around the world for modeling gigs. Can Casey break out of the Mr. Mom role and start helping with the bills?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 1
programme.desc: Jacoby Garrett is fighting to save his marriage of 15 years. Meanwhile his wife, Kim Garrett has her belongings packed and is waiting on the moving truck.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Uninvited Guest Part 2
programme.desc: Jacoby says his wife has stolen money to feed her gambling addiction. Kim says that his mother is a huge thorn in her side. In 15 years, Kim says she is still scratching her head as to why Jacoby’s mother bad mouths her to everyone.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Blame It on the Sun
programme.desc: When Milton came into Sona’s life, all the stars were aligned but now their relationship has been out of orbit. Sona is a firm believer in astrology and zodiac signs, but this Leo can no longer tolerate the cheating ways of Milton who is an Aries.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Secret Lies
programme.desc: Billy wants Marylu to quit pole dancing and stripping, while she wants Billy to confess if he’s straight or not. Billy has a fetish for wearing women’s underwear and he needs to fess up if he likes women, men or both.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Player of the Year
programme.desc: Jordan says that Taurean is the biggest player with the ladies and still decides to lie about it even after she gave him a chance to have an open relationship. He says he talks to other women because Jordan is unaffectionate and verbally abusive.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Legal Repossession
programme.desc: First, Matt, Froy, and Lou do a legal repossession of an attorney's car. Next, Froy, Lyndah, and Sonia are speechless when they interrupt two girls in the back of a car. And finally, Lou and Sonia wrangle with a bunch of confused ATV owners blindsided by

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Blow to the Head
programme.desc: When Froy is seriously injured on a routine repo, the building confrontation between Lou and Matt continues to escalate.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Adapt, Improvise, and Overcome
programme.desc: Lou takes his new guys on their very first repo but, when the debtors attack with chainsaws, Ronnie and Carlos are left to fend for themselves.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Everybody Just a Child?
programme.desc: Sonia and Matt have an unpleasant confrontation with a group of skateboarding ruffians who don't want to give up their car. Froy and Sonia try to take a vehicle from the world's most volatile couple. Plus, Lou and Froy wind up in unknown territory when...

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Final Shot
programme.desc: A new rift between Matt and the rest of the crew puts the fate of the team in question.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Mess with Texas
programme.desc: Matt and Froy face incredible odds against a Texas-sized biker gang looking for a beat down, and when bullets fly, it starts to look like they may never come back home.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Burning Up
programme.desc: Lou's new business relationship with Matt starts to unravel when a botched job puts a serious strain on the company.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Froy Gets Beat Up
programme.desc: Sonia and Lou see the signs of the bad economy first-hand when a rich couple willing give up their late-model Landcruiser. Then, Matt and Sonia need to contend with a spoiled princess whose daddy forgot to pay the bill on her Jetta.

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Car That Rolled Away
programme.desc: Lou and Lyndah reclaim a riding mower from a housewife and her grab-happy husband. Then, Sonia and Matt head out on a scorcher of an afternoon for a repossession. Will they be able to beat both the heat and a pair of geriatric debtors?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Bouquets and Blowtorches
programme.desc: The team returns from a successful mission in Vegas, but there's trouble brewing within the crew's ranks. Ronnie and Carlos repo from a self-defense instructor who lets his students do his dirty work.

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Benefit Of The Doubt
programme.desc: Sabrina embarks on a new adventure in her personal life. (S4, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Inside And Out
programme.desc: Logan seems to be hiding something, and Sabrina appears to be involved. (S4, ep20)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Last Word
programme.desc: Sabrina gets entangled in a situation that could have serious consequences for her. (S4, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Make Him Great
programme.desc: Danni attempts to get answers from Logan regarding his suspicious behaviour. (S4, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: A Brick Wall
programme.desc: Danni finds herself in a compromising predicament and receives unsolicited help from El Fuego. (S4, ep1)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Still Water Runs Deep
programme.desc: Andi finds herself in the middle of a tragedy that involves Zac and Fatima. (S4, ep2)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Family Ties
programme.desc: Jimmie is haunted by the apparition of a mysterious old woman who peers at him in the bathroom of his family's Petersburg, VA home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Paranormal Detour
programme.desc: With time off between cases, Ryan suggests to the PRS team they choose a random town to investigate. They roll into St. Helens, Oregon, home of Twilight, where they learn about the long history of the paranormal in the area.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Tivoli Venue
programme.desc: A well-known venue for accomplished as well as up and coming bands The Tivoli Venue boasts many a ghost. In this episode one of the team gets a warning from the other side that reduces them to tears and something seems to be stalking the team.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse Part 1
programme.desc: Part 1. The upper floors of Wentworth House are a maze of corridors and rooms and the team have one night to investigate as many as possible. With one whistling spirit, groans and loud noises the team are shaken to their core.

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Lindsey Vonn

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Ben Stiller

programme.title: Running Wild With Bear Grylls: Bear Grylls, Uzo Aduba

programme.title: World's Greatest: Marine Animals
programme.desc: From the surprises of colorful reef characters to effervescent penguins, killer sharks, and regal whales, dive into the places where nature reveals itself in some of its most marvelous and bizarre forms.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Nearshore Islands
programme.desc: Some of the world’s greatest islands are so close that they blend in with the mainland. But regardless of their size and origins, they are often the islands we are drawn to the most, each forging their own unique identity.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Jungle Animals
programme.desc: Encounter gorillas and orangutans, killer tree-dwelling pythons, delightful monkeys, awe-inspiring tigers, and millions of land-dwelling red crabs in Australia, the islands of Southeast Asia, Africa, and the Amazon.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Volcanoes
programme.desc: There are few sights on earth as compelling as a volcanic eruption. Volcanoes have the potential to cause death and widespread destruction in a heartbeat, but they also give rise to new life and ecosystems.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Mountains
programme.desc: The earth’s fragile crust has folded and faulted, and nowhere are these natural forces more evident than in the world’s great mountains. Explore the highest peaks of the world’s terrain - the rugged realm between heaven and earth.

programme.title: Arthur's First Day
programme.desc: It's finally the first day of fourth grade and Arthur couldn't be more excited - until he learns Buster is in another class! Meanwhile, D.W. is nervous for her first day of kindergarten. Will Arthur and D.W. be able to make new friends?

programme.title: Arthur: Hic or Treat/Mr. Alwaysright
programme.desc: D.W. gets a case of the hiccups that just won't go away. Will she have them for the rest of her life and set the world record? It seems that Brain is always right about everything and it's really starting to get on Buster's nerves.

programme.title: Arthur: Cents-less/Buster the Lounge Lizard
programme.desc: Mr. Ratburn decides it's time for his class to learn a little about money. For the entire weekend, no one in the class can spend a cent. Buster has the brand-new Dark Bunny Dark Buggy, complete with grappling hook and voice commands!

programme.title: Arthur: Falafelosophy/The Great Lint Rush
programme.desc: Sue Ellen tries her hand at writing and illustrating a graphic novel. Then, Mr. Toad is back! And he's ready to corner the Sock Market, leaving everyone in Elwood City barefoot and bereft.

programme.title: Arthur: The Squirrels/Fern and Persimmony Glitchet
programme.desc: After watching the classic horror movie, "The Squirrels," Arthur and his friends are scared to step out into the playground, and everywhere else! Fern's story about perfect Felicity Bonchance is thought perfectly boring by her friends.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen's Lost Diary/Arthur's Knee
programme.desc: Poor Sue Ellen has lost the one thing she's never without--her diary. Then, Arthur's hurt his knee but won't tell Mom--because then she'd know he'd been playing down at the dump , where he was NOT allowed to go.

programme.title: Arthur: Three's a Crowd/A is for Angry
programme.desc: Prunella's loves doing yoga with her mom, but when her best friend joins them, will she be able to share her time? When Arthur decides to take on The Brain at a checkers competition, everyone rallies behind the underdog.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur And The Big Riddle/Double Dare
programme.desc: Alex Trebek lends his voice as gameshow host Alex Lebek in this episode which poses the age-old riddle--is winning really everything? What if your friends dared you to skip homework--and then double dared you to skip school?

programme.title: War Story: Whistle for a Tiffy
programme.desc: From D-Day, Tactical Air Force fighter-bombers played a pivotal role in Allied battlefield success; Canadian soldiers knew they could always “whistle for a Tiffy”.

programme.title: War Story: Behind Enemy Lines
programme.desc: Royal Canadian Air Force bombing operations play a crucial role in disrupting German infrastructure ahead of the Normandy invasion of June 1944. In the process, dozens of Canadian airmen are forced to bail out over occupied Belgium and France.

programme.title: War Story: Not One Step Back: The Battle of Stalingrad
programme.desc: In the summer of 1942, the Germans advance to seize the rich oilfields of the Caucasus. In their path, the city of Stalingrad, its Soviet defenders personally ordered by Stalin to “take not one step back".

programme.title: War Story: Buchenwald Airmen
programme.desc: For two months in 1944, 168 Allied airmen were shot down over occupied France, betrayed to the Gestapo by the same collaborator, transported to the Nazi concentration and slave labour camp Buchenwald.

programme.title: War Story: The Last Ship: The Sinking of the Esquimalt
programme.desc: On 16 April 1945, a mere three weeks before German surrender, the submarine fired a single torpedo that sank the last Canadian naval vessel lost to enemy action.

programme.title: War Story: Prisoners of the Sun
programme.desc: On 16 November 1941, two Canadian battalions arrived in the British colony of Hong Kong. Their aim: Bolster the Empire’s defenses in the event of aggression by the restless forces of Japan, stationed only kilometres away in occupied China.

programme.title: War Story: Vengeance
programme.desc: In 1941, nearly 30,000 Jews escaped the ghettos and work camps and they joined the growing underground resistance army, actively fighting the Nazis.

programme.title: War Story: Across the Rhine: Paras in Germany
programme.desc: In mid-September 1944, the remnants of the battered 1st Canadian Parachute Battalion participated in the largest parachute drop in history, fought a successful battle.

programme.title: War Story: Out of the Clouds: Paras in Normandy
programme.desc: In Normandy, the 1st Canadian Parachute Battalion proved itself to be in the vanguard of the best-trained and toughest units in the Allied forces.

programme.title: War Story: The Road to Rome
programme.desc: The Road to Rome examines the incredible experiences of Canadian veterans, the victories and horrors of armoured combat, and the pivotal value, far too often neglected, of the overall Italian Campaign.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Stephanie & David
programme.desc: Catfish brings together couples who've interacted solely through screens. In this edition, Stephanie searches for the man she's been talking to in an unseen episode.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Rod & Ebony
programme.desc: Rod met Ebony on a dating web site four years ago, now it's time for the two to meet in person. Is Ebony who she says she is? What will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? (S1, ep9)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Former model Jayme has learned that her online boyfriend is not only fake, but appears to be catfishing other women too! Nev and Max help find the catfish to put an end to his deception. (S5, ep13)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding? (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Trina & Scorpio
programme.desc: Trina is a dancer who always had trouble meeting trustworthy guys, until she met Scorpio, a fellow dancer, online. Will Trina finally get to rendezvous with the only man she's ever loved? (S1, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Ashley & Mike
programme.desc: For over seven years, Ashley has sent dramatically altered photos of herself to her soul mate, Mike, to make her look thinner and more attractive to him. (S2, ep10)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Awkward!
programme.desc: Vinny talks to Jionni and they resolve their differences, leaving Vin and Nicole free to resume their friendship. Meanwhile, Mike finally acknowledges the mistakes he made in the past. (S6, ep11)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Raining Men & Meatballs
programme.desc: The Meatballs hold auditions to find a temporary party pal for Deena. Mike reveals to the roommates that he used to be a stripper and they coax him into showing his stuff. (S6, ep12)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: Heartbreak Hotel
programme.desc: Ronnie worries about his baby's well-being when he gets news about Jen, Vinny misses Pauly D while he's out of town, and Angelina shocks the roommates when she pays a visit.

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: Frenemies
programme.desc: Angelina aggressively tries to smooth things over with Jenni, and Vinny misses Pauly so much that he carries around a cardboard cutout of him.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: Harriette's Heartache
programme.desc: The tablet of terror tops up the torment for Becca, and there's even more heartache for Harriette. Zaralena's misery continues but it's the latest Ex who threatens to unleash havoc.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach: The Truth Comes Out
programme.desc: The arrival of another Ex brings total carnage to the villa. Nicole faces the truth about Jacques Fraser while Ross and Harriette are on the rocks again. Zaralena makes a big decision.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Love, Hate & Obsession

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Long Island Serial Killer
programme.desc: A report on the disappearance of Shannan Gilbert, near Gilgo Beach, New York. The search for Shannan led to the discovery of a total of ten bodies in the scrub brush of Gilgo Beach, leading police to suspect the work of a serial killer.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Last Confession

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Strange Life of Dr. Schwartz

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Fraidy Cat/U.S. Acres: Shell Shocked Sheldon/Nothing to Sneeze At

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends

programme.desc: Binky loses his show to The Buddy Bears./Orson and Wade open a diner./Garfield is too tired to do the show.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Legend of the Lake/Double-Oh Orson/The Black Book
programme.desc: Garfield lectures a group about a famous water voyage./Orson imagines himself a famous secret agent./Jon gives Garfield his "little black book" to hide.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield's Moving Experience/U.S. Acres: Wade: You're Afraid/Good Mousekeeping
programme.desc: Garfield decides to move away from home./Orson hypnotizes Wade./Garfield must rid the house of mice.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Binky Goes Bad/Barn of Fear/Screaming with Binky
programme.desc: A criminal disguises himself as Binky to commit crimes./Orson and crew must spend the night in the old barn./Binky visits an operating room.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Garfield goes to the Lamaar School of Cats. Roy Rooster learns the art of doublespeak.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: Jon gets to meet Vivacia, the TV horror show hostess of his dreams. Wade Duck is caught in a 60-minute style interview.

programme.title: Garfield & Friends: Garfield and Friends
programme.desc: After falling asleep while playing a board game, Jon dreams he and Garfield are in it.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Condemned
programme.desc: Jim Phelps comes to the aid of a personal friend.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Counterfeiter
programme.desc: Destroying a drug ring is the task of the IMF.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Town
programme.desc: IMF leader Jim Phelps is marked for murder.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Killing
programme.desc: The IMF sets out to destroy a murder-for-hire organization.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Phoenix
programme.desc: The IMF foils the attempts of a once-powerful communist to regain power.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Making a Move
programme.desc: Welcome to the neighborhood! Anna has just moved to the neighborhood and is missing her old friends. Barney and his friends help her discover that moving is an adventure with new places to explore and new friends to meet.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Best In Show - Ducks And Fish
programme.desc: When the kids decide to have a Dog Show to show off their pets, BJ feels a little left out. He doesn't have a dog, and he sure wishes he did! A friend from the park shares her dog with BJ so he can join in the fun.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop has trouble following the rules and taking turns while playing games. BJ hurts his toe while pretending to be Captain Pickles.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Everybody's Got Feelings
programme.desc: Barney helps Baby Bop and BJ learn that everyone has feelings—happy, sad, angry—and sometimes all those feelings can be experienced in just one day.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Here Kitty, Kitty
programme.desc: When Miss Jo loses her cat, Barney and the children spend the day helping her find it. Along the way, they learn all about cats.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Numbers! Numbers!
programme.desc: Tony shares a box full of numbers that he made with his dad. He is showing them off when a gust of wind blows them all away. Barney and the kids decide to go on a number hunt. They soon find Baby Bop and their hunt takes the group all over the park.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Sharing Is Caring!
programme.desc: The children bring toys to donate to Mr. Boyd's toy drive. Baby Bop and BJ arrive and after some convincing, Baby Bop learns about the merits of sharing.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: It’s Barney’s birthday, and there are surprises around every corner. Baby Bop is practicing her marching because she will be joining a real marching rhythm band and is having trouble keeping a beat.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: All About Me
programme.desc: Baby Bop and BJ have fun playing ball in the park. Barney helps them learn that trying something new can also be fun. Baby Bop prepares a special picnic for BJ, but much to his surprise, it consists mostly of her favorite foods.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE You Foos You Lose
programme.desc: When their truck breaks down, Ton and Allen lay it all on the line to raise money to fix her. They score a Foosball table, Tommy Gun drums and to Ton's delight, a treasure trove of Twinkies, but will it be enough?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Wreck-Shaw
programme.desc: Allen drags a starving Ton to a weekend auction and some newbie buyers try to eat up all the profit. Will a rickshaw, a wrecking ball, and blast detonators be enough to satisfy Ton's appetite, or will the guys go home hungry?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Hook, Line & Printer
programme.desc: A last-minute auction in Norwalk proves challenging when Ton and Allen go toe-to-toe with a real life cowboy couple. When the dust settles, the guys uncover a 3D printer and a grappling hook gun they can't wait to shoot.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Trading Places
programme.desc: When an injury sidelines Allen, he stays at the shop while Ton takes Big Sis to the auction and goes rogue, ignoring Allen's advice and making risky purchases that could lose the partners a boatload of cash.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Without a Chute
programme.desc: After a tough auction, things get worse when the shop's landlord wants to talk to the guys. Ton tries to negotiate with him while Allen has to put an experimental powered parachute to the test to save the day's profits.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE The Fall Guys
programme.desc: The pressures of running a shop are taking a toll on Ton and Allen and not even the discovery of a stunt-man's fall bag can ease the tension. When things get heated, Ton abandons the partnership and leaves town.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: NEW EPISODE Nothing But Net

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Team One's efforts to save a kidnapped woman's life are dependent in large part on the abductor's brother, who holds a dark family secret.

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Flashpoint

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: In Teletubbyland, some voice trumpets rise and make some funny animal noises. They baa like sheep, moo like cows, meow like cats and oink like pigs.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies pop up to see some boys who live on a farm. The boys talk about their chicks. Dipsy looks out of the window.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies love playing "Boo!" The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number six. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa get their knees dirty and have fun getting them clean.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: A voice trumpet rises and makes quacking sounds, which Dipsy finds very amusing. He joins the other Teletubbies to watch two children feeding some ducks. In Teletubbyland, Little Bo Peep has lost her sheep.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch some children learn about the number four. They have fun singing a song of four before it's time for Tubby Bye-Bye.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies are asleep, but Noo-Noo tidies up their blankets. They stop chasing him to watch some children learn about the number five.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Tubbies are excited to see seven clouds appear in Teletubbyland. Some children learn about the number seven and in Teletubbyland, a voice trumpet rises and teaches the Tubbies to count to seven.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Po loves jumping. She jumps inside Home Hill, then jumps off to watch some children go blackberry picking. Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Po play a hiding game. Laa-Laa can't see them so she decides to play a game with her ball.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: The Teletubbies watch Daniel and Stephanie make big round pancakes. They are having a round and round day. They run round and round in Teletubbyland, but they stop to see the dancing bear in the Carousel, then there's time for one more dance.

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Teletubbies love dancing, but they love children even more. So everything stops when they watch some children painting in a most unusual way. Back at the house, a trail leads Tinky Winky all around Teletubbyland to find out.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Roads and Bridges

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Trix is looking for something to do so JJ sends her to deliver a bag of wood chippings to Bob who is building a Jungle Jim climbing frame in the school playground. Trix likes being busy and starts offering to fetch and carry everything for everyone.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and Wendy are converting an old shop into a brand new restaurant for Mr Sabatini. Mr Sabatini asks Wendy to be the guest of honour at the grand opening. She is delighted but terrified at the prospect of giving a speech in public.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is making a through-lounge at the Bentleys’, while Wendy goes to JJ’s yard with Lofty and Dizzy to collect a steel joist and other materials. Lofty is nervous about carrying the joist, but Dizzy and Trix race off with the bricks and mortar.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Mr and Mrs Sabatini have asked Bob to convert a local house into a delicatessen. Unfortunately for Roley, there is no rolling to be done. The gang leaves to get on with the job and Roley decides to tag along just in case.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the gang have been asked to replace some burst pipes under the main road. Meanwhile Jenny is in town to persuade Wendy to take a much-needed holiday. Unfortunately, there’s lots of work to do and Wendy simply doesn’t have time to go away.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob is rendering a wall for Mr Sabatini. The job is straightforward, but the finished result looks rather plain, so Bob offers to get some tiles from JJ’s yard to decorate it. While Bob is gone, Mr Sabatini demonstrates his soccer skills to Dizzy.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob has volunteered to look after the farm whilst Farmer Pickles takes Humpty to a pig show. Bob arrives with Lofty at the crack of dawn whilst Wendy is due later to repair the roof on the barn.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s a big day, as the team are building Bob’s new workshop at his new yard. Scoop is desperate to get stuck in and beavers about doing everything he can to help. Bob needs some old floorboards collecting from Bobsville, and sends Scoop to pick them up.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: It’s Mr and Mrs Bentley’s twenty fifth wedding anniversary and to celebrate Mr Bentley asks Bob and the gang to build a special summer house. Mrs Bentley is out for the day and the summer house is to be a surprise.

programme.title: Bob the Builder

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team is on the trail of a pyromaniac mutant who is causing mayhem, while Shalimar is forced to set aside her fear of fire to save Emma.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team wrestles to contain Brennan's out-of-control mutant powers when he puts the mission to protect a senator's daughter in danger.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: Shalimar gets into trouble when the team encounters a Cold War-era mutant with the ability to alter reality and destroy people's minds.

programme.title: Mutant X
programme.desc: The team helps the crew of an ocean research station threatened by a prehistoric creature previously thought to be extinct.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Essence
programme.desc: Renee's brother has PTSD. In a desperate effort to help him, she agrees to let him undergo special treatment. The treatment removes his emotion. The project is overseen by Sandoval and the emotion they take is given to Da'an.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Phantom Companion
programme.desc: While on board the mothership, Renee sustains an injury and while being treated, she gets pulled into the walls and disappears.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dream Stalker
programme.desc: Street asks Liam to help a friend who's arrested for the murder of a man he hated. Liam talks to him and he claims that he dreamed of killing him.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Lost Generation
programme.desc: A CVI malfunctions and kills a soon-to-be father. The investigation leads Liam and Renee to a fertility clinic. Renee finds out she is infertile and suspects that Taelon technology is affecting worldwide fertility.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Summit
programme.desc: Da'an leaves and doesn't being Liam along. Zo'or is frantic as to why Da'an left. Liam wants to help but Zo'or doesn't trust him because he doesn't have a CVI, so Liam agrees to be implanted.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Dark Matter
programme.desc: When the mother ship hits dark matter, the ship dos not begin to heal itself. Zo'or is left in an unconscious state and Sandoval takes control. He decides it is time to liberate the Earth from the Taelons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Keys to the Kingdom
programme.desc: The relic left by Ma'el is stolen from the mother ship. Zo'or threatens to destroy a major city if it isn't returned. Liam believes the final chapters contain information on synthesizing core energy.

programme.title: The Lost World: Trapped
programme.desc: An explosion in the jungle leaves Marguerite and Roxton trapped in a cavern, and Challenger with a case of amnesia that erases his memory of them. Finn helps Veronica uncover more of her past.

programme.title: The Lost World: Heart of the Storm
programme.desc: A strange phenomena brings a cavalcade of dangers-spanning time and space-to the plateau, threatening its very existence. Veronica believes she must use the Trion to save her friends.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Journey Begins
programme.desc: With proof that prehistoric creatures may still be living, a group led by Professor George Challenger is assembled to go on an expedition to uncover more.

programme.title: The Lost World: Stranded
programme.desc: The group saves Chief Jacoba's daughter Assai from the Ape men earning them safe passage home through his caves. But Marguerite's greed causes the cave to collapse on itself.

programme.title: The Lost World: More Than Human
programme.desc: The adventurers are captured by a reptilian race in a land where humans are at the bottom of the hierarchy. They come across other enslaved humans and rally them to help fight back.

programme.title: The Lost World: Nectar
programme.desc: To retrieve an antidote that will save professor Summerlee from deadly venom, the explorers must venture into a bee hive that no human has ever made it out of alive.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Stage and screen stars Stefanie Powers and Don Warrington join Charles Hanson and Margie Cooper to make big profits buying and selling antiques. They go from Hertfordshire to auction in West Sussex, with magic and Mosquitos along the way.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Sheila Hancock takes on Sandi Toksvig around the Isle of Wight--Sheila's birthplace--visiting a globe-making firm and saucy postcard museum. Philip Serrell and David Barby lend a hand with buying and selling at auction in Tunbridge Wells.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Journalists Bill Turnbull and Louise Minchin, more used to the BBC Breakfast couch than antiquing, compete with the help of Philip Serrell and David Barby. They begin in greater Manchester and end up at auction in Bridgenorth, Shropshire.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Charles Hansun and Thomas Plant help TV and radio legend David "Diddy" Hamilton and journalist Kate Silverton hunt for hidden treasure. Starting in Newark, they take in Ruddington, Nottingham and Derby, finishing in Chiswick, west London.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Neil Stuke and Penny Smith hit the road with £400, shopping in Herefordshire with help from Paul Laidlaw and Thomas Plant and diversions to a cider museum and puppetry archive. At the auction in Newport, Shropshire, who will win the day?

programme.title: The Vault
programme.desc: Full session replay of Series 4: Champions Night, featuring Luke Littler, Colin Osborne, and more!

programme.title: Tungsten Talk
programme.desc: Simon Adams joins Henry Deacon for a revealing interview about his darts journey.

programme.title: On the Oche
programme.desc: On The Oche: Episode 1- The Darts Referee joins Jake Kenyon for a chuck and a chat.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Chloe and Jordan are living their best lives on holiday in Corfu. Shannon asks Charlie to move in. Sassi goes through with the big operation and Amber tries to stay positive about the baby. (S6, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Sassi and Darren watch Zena'ya take to the catwalk. Shannon plans a family photoshoot but Charlie doesn't go. Chloe chops off Marley's hair for charity. Amber hits an all time low. (S6, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: The girls are back and like you've never seen them before. Megan is loved up, Chloe is heart broken, Amber is about to drop and there's a new girl on the block! (S7, ep1)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Chloe cries a river over Jordan while Megan gets super Intense with new boyfriend Tel. Amber struggles without Ste. New Mum Emma gets her hopes up only to get let down. (S7, ep2)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Heartbroken Chloe gets some advice she doesn't want to hear. Amber and Ste come to blows. The honeymoon period is over for Megan and new mum Emma tries to enjoy her 18th. (S7, ep3)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: Amber and Ste welcome baby Hudson into the world. Chloe enjoys watching Jordan grovel while Emma makes new friends. Megan's desperate to make space in her world for Tel. (S7, ep4)

programme.title: 48 Hours: Amanda Knox: The Untold Story
programme.desc: The story of Amanda Knox, an American exchange student who was convicted, along with her Italian boyfriend, Raffaelle Sollecito, of murdering Amanda’s British roommate, Meredith Kercher in 2007.

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: In 1986, 21-year-old Mitzi Nalley was brutally murdered in her Austin, Texas home. Police arrested Jonathan Wayne Nobles, who confessed to the crime and was sentenced to the death penalty.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Fatal Attraction
programme.desc: Thomas Capano, a successful Delaware lawyer lived a double life, a devoted family man while having affairs. When Anne Marie Fahey, one of these women, mysteriously disappeared police were at first stumped. Finally evidence led to Capano.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Ghosts of Mississippi
programme.desc: A report on a string of unsolved homicides in Columbus, Mississippi. Five elderly residents, all living within a mile of each other, were killed within 18 months. Police say, a terrified community believes a serial killer is on the loose.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Ambushed
programme.desc: A man helps a new detective figure out who murdered his father.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Negotiators
programme.desc: An inside look at 23-year-old Jarrett Jordan, a disturbed man who shot three people and barricaded himself in a house in Queens, NY. He had with him his four-month-old daughter and three hostages.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Ben Horne's brother, Jerry, arrives in Twin Peaks; James and Donna decide to be together. Ben and Jerry travel to One Eyed Jacks and meet with it's madam, Blackie O'Reilly. Audrey leaves a clue for Cooper.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: The next morning, Cooper meets with Audrey, who confesses to leaving him the note about One Eyed Jacks. Cooper tells Truman he can't remember who the killer was in his dream, but insists the dream is a code to solving the crime.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper questions Dr. Jacoby, who suspects Leo Johnson is the killer. Cooper's supervisor, Gordon Cole, calls in with Albert's report. Josie Packard spies on Ben Horne and Catherine Martell. Hawk tracks down the One Armed Man.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Cooper and company have tea with the Log Lady. The Log Lady tells them there was a third man following after Leo and Jacques the night Laura died. At Jacques Renault's cabin Cooper, Hawk, and Truman find Waldo the bird.

programme.title: Twin Peaks
programme.desc: Audrey cons her way into working at the perfume counter where Laura worked. She discovers that it's being used as a recruitment post for One Eyed Jacks. James, Donna and Maddy plan to lure Jacoby away from his office.
